roleset.name: change (slightly)
roleset.note: ADJUST-V NOTES: Member of Vncls adjust-26.9. Comparison with 'set' and 'change'. (from adjust.01-v)
ADJUSTMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry adjust.01, OntoNotes grouping adjustment-n senses 1,2,3; maps to VN entry adjust-26.9. Framed by Claire. (from adjustment.01-n)

role.descr: adjusted to; goal state; outside situation that arg1 is wanted to match

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Banks adjusted payouts on CD's in the most recent week.

example.name: with purpose
example.text: [All the figures]-1 are adjusted *trace*-1 to remove usual seasonal patterns.

example.name: purpose transformed
example.text: [All the figures]-1 are adjusted *trace*-1 for inflation.

example.name: Arg 1, beneficiary
example.text: Crawford evaluates health care plans , manages medical anddisability aspects of worker 's compensation injuries and isinvolved in claims adjustments for insurance companies .

example.name: NP only, args 1 & 4
example.text: adjustments to reserves for workers ' compensation claims

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: This girl needs an attitude adjustment!

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: John's adjustment of the engine gave his car more power.

example.name: With arg 2
example.text: She describes her adjustment to the culture of the United States after moving to Baltimore from England
example.arg: to the culture of the United States
